alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 3:05AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph expected. Wind gusts will be higher in the mountains. * WHERE...Schweitzer Mountain Road, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Coeur d`Alene, Fourth Of July Pass, Deer Park, Chesaw Road, Flowery Trail Road, Eastport, St. Maries, Metaline, Wauconda, Athol, Republic, Pinehurst, Hayden, Springdale-Hunters Road, Tiger, Colville, Kettle Falls, Plummer, Worley, Chewelah, Genesee, Inchelium, Moscow, Priest River, Sherman Pass, Northport, Clark Fork, Kellogg, Bonners Ferry, Newport, Potlatch, Orin-Rice Road, Wallace, Metaline Falls, Fernwood, Dobson Pass, Post Falls, Boulder Creek Road, Sandpoint, Osburn, Ione, Lookout Pass, Mullan, and Fruitland. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
